title: Nerf Hecarim
body:
Even in LCS, a Maokai and a Alistair couldn't peel a Hecarim off Piglets Lucian, Lucian died, and Hecarim escaped with 200 HP left. Such bullshit. Nerf to the ground.

EDIT: Hecarim has a 100% winrate in LCS Spingsplit btw.

replies.body:
You forgot to mention the fact that Balls had almost /triple/ the Maokai's cs, while being I think 4/0 at the time. That was a fed pony. 


If anything, nerf Trinity Force.
He was nerfed in this patch...

I wish i seen these op hecarims. 

I seen so many hecarim tops on my team that fed and hecarim tops that fed us. 

Don't get me wrong we win games, but no thanks to hecarim. 

I role tryndamere vs hecarims.  MAX W and watch him try to damage and run away. 


Edit:  Thought ill mention
As of April 12 10:16 pm i had a hecarim on my team that finally carried top and won us the game.
Go ahead downvote away without responding why he doesn't need nerfs. He's a huge lane bully, not even Irelia can match his strength. Then diving 1v3 and getting a kill and escaping? Come on now.
